Home | Women's Resource Center (WRC)| UC Riverside 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Due to the impact of COVID-19, our Ethnic & Gender campus locations are closed until further notice. Our staff is working remotely and available to support you along your Highlander journey. We look forward to being back on campus and supporting you in-person. Please continue to wash your hands, wear a face covering, and maintain physical distance.

 Women's Resource Center 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Previous Next 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Everyone Is Welcome Here 
 For more than 40 years, the Women's Resource Center (WRC) has created amazing opportunities for all UCR students. We invite you to become a partner and beneficiary of groundbreaking efforts that support women's lives. Embolden yourself with our programs and services. Come to one of our exciting special events. Get involved and help make our impact that much stronger. 
 We provide a safe space for all students to address gender issues, connect with campus safety programs, access sexual assault and domestic violence support, take on key leadership roles, and develop a sense of empowerment. 
 

 
 
 
 
 Here for You, Always 
 Student Affairs is here to support you throughout the campus closure.
